name: What is Modern Art?
description:
What is Modern Art? Personality, my Bias is against modern art simply because I envy those who make a lot of profit with what looks like minimal effort. This is a Satire commentary walk through of my opinion towards Modern Art which features the most outrageous artworks, most expensive and some of my classmate attempting modern art.  This was made for a school assignment and I am really proud how it turned out. It was my first time trying out Unreal UI and Sequence Blue Print.

Game engine used: Unreal Engine 4
